txt.en: 'The Trév Gállorg will never bow to the Iron Crown.'
'Beware the dark watchers of Angmar. Rammas Deluon can turn a Man's blood to ice in his veins.'
'The Trév Duvárdain have thrown their lot in with the evil lords of Carn Dûm.'
'That wretch Golodir...where is he now? Either hiding in the hills or dead in the dirt, I say.'
'The Iron Crown holds Angmar in its grasp, but the Trév Gállorg will never submit!'
'All of us must have a Fém, and perform it as best we may.'
'The Búth Sánkhas is where the tales of our people are sung.'
'The Búth Luikh is the tent where warriors steel for battle.'
